text: Gaston Amson (17 November 1883 - 16 July 1960) was a French fencer. He won a silver and a bronze medal at the 1920 Summer Olympics and a silver at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1883 births Category:1960 deaths Category:French male fencers Category:French épée fencers Category:French foil fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Sportspeople from Paris Category:Medalists at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1928 Summer Olympics
title: Gaston Amson
